## Documentation

**IMPORTANT: Documentation must be in the correct folder, not in `docs/` root.**

- [ ] Documentation updated in appropriate folder:
  - [ ] `01-product/` (product requirements, roadmap)
  - [ ] `02-architecture/` (architecture, database schema)
  - [ ] `03-development/` (developer guides, API docs)
  - [ ] `04-ai-integration/` (AI features, specifications)
  - [ ] `05-deployment/` (deployment, configuration, operations)
  - [ ] `06-testing/` (test plans, test cases)
  - [ ] `99-archive/` (implementation summaries only)
  - [ ] No documentation changes needed
- [ ] API reference updated (if API changes were made)
- [ ] Folder README updated (if significant new docs added)
- [ ] CLAUDE.md updated (if workflow or architecture changed)

## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] No compilation warnings or errors
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Performance impact considered
- [ ] Error handling implemented appropriately
- [ ] Logging added where appropriate
